trends: There have been no other sightings in Helotes
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Was looking out at the sky and viewed an unusual object hovering in the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsIn the early morning hours, I was looking out at the stars in the sky from my bedroom window. We live in the hill country and the sky was very clear that evening. I noticed a bright light in the north east, thinking it might be a star. It was much, much brighter than the other stars and began to move very quickly both vertically and horizontally. The lights seemed to pulsate, and the vehicle moved at rapid speeds. I couldn't take my eyes off it as it was unlike anything I have ever observed in the night sky. It lasted about 10-15 minutes and disappeared.
